text: This is an incomplete list of basilicas of the Roman Catholic Church in Germany. A basilica is a church with certain privileges conferred on it by the Pope. Currently there are some 76 basilicas in Germany. == List of basilicas == {|class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Location ! Circumscription ! Basilica !
